title: The Devereaux Recipe
full_text:
The Devereaux Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
Bulleit
bourbon
1/2
ounce
St. Germain
elderflower liqueur
1/2
ounce
fresh juice
from
1
whole
lemon
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
(see note)
About
3
ounces
sparkling wine
Large mint leaf
for garnish
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add bourbon, St. Germain, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass.
Top with sparkling wine and garnish with mint leaf.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Whiskey
Champagne
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
